title: How to Make Edible Cookie Dough

steps.title: Place the butter in a large cooking bowl and add the sugar.
steps.content: Place the butter in a large cooking bowl and add the sugar. Cream together with a fork until you get a smooth texture. Add vanilla.

steps.title: Sieve the flour and pinch of salt into the mix and stir again until the mix is as thick and sturdy as possible.
steps.content: Sieve the flour and pinch of salt into the mix and stir again until the mix is as thick and sturdy as possible.

steps.title: Eat the cookie dough as it is.
steps.content: Eat the cookie dough as it is. Enjoy! Or keep going and make them into cookies.

steps.title: Follow Steps 1 and 2 for standard dough above.
steps.content: Follow Steps 1 and 2 for standard dough above.

steps.title: When sieving in the flour, add the cocoa powder.
steps.content: When sieving in the flour, add the cocoa powder.

steps.title: Mix in the chocolate chips for taste.
steps.content: Mix in the chocolate chips for taste.

steps.title: Mix the butter, sugar, and milk together.
steps.content: Mix the butter, sugar, and milk together. If you want very dry and crackly dough, do not add milk. For results that look like dough or thick paste, add milk.

steps.title: When done, take another bowl and mix the vanilla and flour into a big ball.
steps.content: When done, take another bowl and mix the vanilla and flour into a big ball.

steps.title: Mash the two balls together until it forms one big ball.
steps.content: Mash the two balls together until it forms one big ball.

steps.title: Keep rolling and mashing until it becomes a very thick paste.
steps.content: Keep rolling and mashing until it becomes a very thick paste. It is now ready to eat.

steps.title: To make into a cookie, add 3 tablespoons (44.4 ml) of sugar, chocolate chips and sprinkles (optional) and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of milk.
steps.content: To make into a cookie, add 3 tablespoons (44.4 ml) of sugar, chocolate chips and sprinkles (optional) and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of milk. Bake for 17-20 minutes or until golden brown and crispy.
